availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Loton W. Jones (Caldwell Co., Ky, physician )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, physician. North Carolina native. Married to Paulina Jones. Father of Loton Jones. Physician in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed Mary Dixon as a domestic servant in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 89.
"Dr Loton W. Jones (1828-1891)," Find A Grave, Memorial #138020314, accessed December 2, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/138020314.
